articles.description: The share touched its 52-week high Rs 87.95 and 52-week low Rs 5.55 on 18 March, 2020 and 06 March, 2020, respectively.
articles.content:
Private lender Yes Bank share price rose in the early trade on March 3 after its shareholders approved a proposal to raise Rs 10,000 crore capital with the requisite majority.

articles.title: Exports slip into negative zone in Feb as core shipments slow - The Indian Express
articles.description: Exports had crashed between March and May 2020, as the government was forced to impose a stringent lockdown to battle the pandemic.
